| History                 = Following his rejection of [[Khonshu (Earth-616)|Khonshu]], the vigilante [[Marc Spector (Earth-616)|Moon Knight]] opted to carry on with his former master's duty to protect night travelers. He claimed a territory in [[Manhattan]] and established a congregation called the Midnight Mission whose doors were open for anybody to request his help. One of Moon Knight's earliest rescuees were a group of neighbors forcibly turned into vampires by a vampiric pyramid scheme cult. After killing their "recruiters," one of the vampires, a woman named [[Reese (Vampire) (Earth-616)|Reese]], became the receptionist at the Midnight Mission and Moon Knight's right hand.{{r|Moon Knight Vol 9 1}}
